title: Add total profit display and introduction text

requirements.summary: Calculate and display total profit across all 5 markets with Indian Rupee formatting
acceptanceCriteria: Total profit is calculated as the sum of all 5 market profits
Total profit updates automatically when any market's price selection changes
Total profit correctly reflects ₹0 for Market 5 when 'Do Not Enter' is selected
Total profit is displayed with proper Indian Rupee (₹) formatting using the existing formatCurrency utility
Total profit display is visually prominent and clearly labeled

file_operations.description: Add calculation logic to compute total profit by summing individual market profits from all 5 markets. Include a new prominently styled section displaying the total profit value with the label 'Total Profit Across All Markets' using the existing formatCurrency utility for Indian Rupee formatting. Ensure the total updates reactively whenever any market's price selection changes.

requirements.summary: Add introduction section at the top of the page with heading and specified text content
acceptanceCriteria: Introduction section appears at the top of the page, above the market sections
Heading 'Introduction' is clearly visible and properly styled
All provided introduction text is displayed exactly as specified
Text is formatted with appropriate line breaks between paragraphs for readability
Introduction styling matches the warm leather-inspired design theme of the application

file_operations.description: Add an introduction section at the top of the component, before the market sections grid. Include a heading 'Introduction' styled consistently with the warm leather-inspired theme, followed by the exact text provided in the requirement formatted with appropriate paragraph breaks for readability. Use earth tone colors (browns, tans, creams) consistent with the existing color scheme defined in the Tailwind configuration.
